name: Orbital Decay (jeefjerfy)
description:
Alone on a small module in space, you have spent your days twiddling your thumbs and reading Artemis Fowl fan fiction. One morning, disaster strikes when your craft begins falling out of the sky. Thankfully, the onboard AI is ready and willing to help you avoid a fiery crash! Follow their instructions, and you just might survive!

This is a short game where you click buttons and listen to a computer talk to you.

Controls: Use the mouse to click on the various knobs and switches on the console.

This game was made over the week of 9/27/2020, the third in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
